title: Sri Lanka kept to 242 despite Jayawardene ton
content: Innings Sri Lanka 242 (Jayawardene 118, Dilshan 53, Yadav 4-53 ) v India A disastrous batting Powerplay that cost Sri Lanka three wickets for 16 runs sucked the oxygen out of an already endangered innings and set the visitors on course for their third mediocre score of the series. On a track expected to feature…
